DOC.brief_summary: The study combine Phase-I like ( safety ) Phase-II like ( efficacy ) double blind randomized placebo control trial . The objective investigate whether combination AG Rg3-enriched Korean Red ginseng add conventional medical treatment effective safe long-term management high blood pressure manage type 2 diabetes . Eighty-five subject type 2 diabetes concomitant high blood pressure ( key inclusion criterion : HbA1c ≥ 6.5 % - ≤ 8.0 % ) recruit study .
